data.title: Bibliograph
data.meta_description: An open data platform that grows library visibility through a collaboration of thousands of libraries and their service providers. Our mission is to build new pathways to libraries on the Web. Together, we share structured data and connect people with the books they want to read.

Title from container. Cataloging from credits At head of title: Nickelodeon Additional writers: Bob Schooley, Mark McCorkle, Todd Garfield Based on the characters created by Tom McGrath, Eric Darnell, Mireille Soria from the DreamWorks animation movie "Madagascar" Contains two episodes from the animated television program that originally aired in 2008
